MSG_GREETING: Hi! I am Ivanka. I am here to assist you with any questions you might have.
MSG_ASK_EMAIL: Can I have your email address?
MSG_WAIT: Ooh, seems like a real pickle! I'll quickly run and find an expert who can help you.
MSG_NO_AGENTS: I'm so sorry, all our experts are busy right now.
MSG_ASK_PHONE: Please provide a phone number, and someone will call you back at the earliest.
MSG_CALLBACK_ACK: Super, you can expect a call from us soon. Peace out, homie!
MSG_ABORT: Damn! Something went wrong. Please try reaching out some time later.
